question:
You and your family are living in rented accommodation in an English speaking country. You are not satisfied with the condition of some of the furniture.

Write a letter to your friend. In your letter

introduce yourself
explain what is wrong with the furniture
say what action you would like the landlord to take
text: I am a resident of apartment A303 at your community. I recently moved in to the city so it's really wonderfull of you to assign me a fully furnished house. I am, however, facing issues with few furniture items which I would like to bring to your attention.

First of all, the bedroom houses only one Bunk Bed. Being a single guy, it's already wastefull to assing me that. To add to it, the bed is extremely noisy. Whenever I turn while sleeping it makes a rather horrific sound. I have already woken up scared at multiple occassions now. Another item that has been troubling me a lot is the dining table. It seems the height of the table's legs is not properly aligned due to which it keeps wobbling. For now, I am holding the table with one hand while eating with other to keep it stable.
Can I please request you to send your in-house handyman to help fix these issues. Feel free to enter the apartment with your keys since I am out for work pretty much the whole day.
